functionDecorators.name: swapCTokenForCToken
functionDecorators.description: Redeems a cToken for its base token, swaps it on UniSwap for the desired output token, mints cTokens for the output and returns them to the caller. Note: Caller must already have approved Compounder to transfer at least redeemAmount of sellCToken.

parameterDecorators.name: sellToken
parameterDecorators.description: Base token for the cToken to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: buyToken
parameterDecorators.description: Base token for the cToken to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: minBuyToken
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum number of buyTokens for the swap.

functionDecorators.name: swapCTokenForToken
functionDecorators.description: Redeems a cToken for its base token, then swaps it on UniSwap for the desired output token and transfers it to the caller. Note: Caller must already have approved Compounder to transfer at least redeemAmount of sellCToken.

parameterDecorators.name: sellToken
parameterDecorators.description: Base token for the cToken to sell.

functionDecorators.name: swapTokenForCToken
functionDecorators.description: Swaps a token on uniswap, then mints cTokens for the purchased token. Note: Caller must already have approved Compounder to transfer at least sellAmount of sellToken.

parameterDecorators.name: buyToken
parameterDecorators.description: Base token to swap sellToken for.

parameterDecorators.name: minBuyToken
parameterDecorators.description: Minimum number of buyToken to receive.
